definition: to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

pinyin: qi4 rong2 jiao1 zhen1 cha2 yi2

definition: National Reconnaissance Office (of the United States)
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Zhen1 cha2 ju2

sentences.english: Rain and snow don't penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.chinese: 你的偵察和搜尋檢定不再因雨和雪受到處罰。

sentences.english: The paper briefly describes present state of airborne laser reconnaissance subaquatic targets technology at abroad.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了國外機載激光偵察水下目標技術的發展現狀。
噴氣式戰鬥機在空中偵察巡邏。

sentences.english: This study made an attempt for chaotic anti-control application in the ocean reconnaissance robot.
sentences.chinese: 爲混沌反控制在海洋偵察機器人的應用做了嘗試。

sentences.english: The platoon was sent to reconnoitre the village before the attack.
sentences.chinese: 在發動進攻前，這個排奉命偵察該村。

sentences.english: I left a sergeant in command and rode forward to reconnoitre.
sentences.chinese: 我留下一名中士指揮，自己策馬前去偵察敵情。

sentences.english: You'll need to scout ahead to make sure Basso's route is safe.
sentences.chinese: 你需要在前面偵察，確認巴索要走的路線是安全的。

sentences.english: Command, huang feng call third reconnaissance teams, have been slow to respond.
sentences.chinese: 司令部內，黃鳴鋒呼叫第三偵察小隊，遲遲沒有迴應。

sentences.english: The scouts paired off and began to patrol the area.
sentences.chinese: 偵察員們分成兩人一組，開始巡邏這一地區。
他是一名北方軍的偵察兵。

sentences.english: I'm going out myself with the adjutant to recce training areas.
sentences.chinese: 我要親自和副官出去偵察一下訓練地區。

sentences.english: The scouts infiltrated into the enemy positions.
sentences.chinese: 偵察兵滲透到敵人陣地後面去了。

sentences.english: The detective detected that the arch was under the marching Arctic architects’ protection.
sentences.chinese: 偵察察覺拱門受到行進的北極建築師們的保護。

sentences.english: Scouting is a risky maneuver but it can pay off.
sentences.chinese: 偵察是一項危險的行動，但這個險值得冒。

sentences.english: Tiny models could be used as spies while gargantuan versions served as mobile armor.
sentences.chinese: 微小的型號能用於偵察，而巨型版本可充當移動機甲。

sentences.english: One of the ships turned its gun turret on a Japanesereconnaissance plane.
sentences.chinese: 其中一艘艦隻將炮管瞄向日方偵察機。

definition: group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
